text:
Boris Johnson just said that testing "capacity currently exceeds demand" when 65 MILLION people have been stuck at home for TWO MONTHS out of fear that they or someone they meet MIGHT have the disease!! THERE'S YOUR DEMAND!

Sorry to say this, @BorisJohnson, but STFU! #pmqs https://t.co/N2Byr1nATy
